sentence: Mr. SCHIFF. Mr. President, I was necessarily absent for rollcall vote  No. 632, H.J. Res. 131, a joint resolution providing for congressional  disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule  submitted by the Bureau of Land Management relating…

…Speaker, I rise today in defense of the frontier  spirit that is core to the American identity.

I rise today to urge my colleagues to vote ``no'' on S.J. Res. 80 and  H.J. Res. 131, two proposals that would forever alter the Coastal Plain  of the Arctic refuge and the special areas of the western Arctic in the  great State of Alaska.

Let me tell you…

Mr. Speaker, I strongly oppose H.J. Res. 131. The Congressional  Review Act resolution here would overturn BLM's Coastal Plain Oil and  Gas Leasing Program Record of Decision.

My Republican colleagues are, once again,…

…Coastal  Plain of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge, ANWR. I urge my  colleagues to support the Alaska congressional delegation's joint  resolution of disapproval, H.J. Res. 131 and S.J. Res. 91, to reject  unlawful regulatory overreach.

The implementation of the Biden administration's 2024 Coastal Plain  Oil and Gas Leasing Program Record of Decision,…
